name: cooler-loans-api-get
description: API to get snapshot data for Cooler Loans

scripts.build:jsonschema: yarn typescript-json-schema ../../packages/typescript-codegen/src/types/snapshot.ts Snapshot --required -o tmp/snapshot.jsonschema && yarn typescript-json-schema ../../packages/typescript-codegen/src/types/loanSnapshot.ts LoanSnapshot --required -o tmp/loanSnapshot.jsonschema
scripts.build:openapi: yarn -s json-schema-to-openapi-schema convert tmp/snapshot.jsonschema > openapi/snapshot.yaml && prettier --write openapi/
